s: There are essentially only two (2) big brands in Furikake (rice seasoning)...Marumiya and Nagatanien. Both are great, but IMO (and both are sold here on Amazon), Marumiya is the clear winner. I lost over 100 pounds swithcing to a primarily rice-based diet.
